jcr:root.jcr:description: This navigation displays text links that are grouped together into a common category (eg. Brands). Authors can add a single descriptive header title (optional) and format links in 2 or 3 columns. Optional to the author are promo images which can be formatted as one large image, two side-by-side images, or four images stacked 2:2. Navigation displays image link rather than text and has a wide variety of layouts. Authors can add optional text below each image. Images can be formatted as two columns in a single row (2:1) or 2, 3, or 4 columns in 2 rows (2:2, 3:2, 4:2). Optional features consist of a single large promo image with optional text and CTA overlay.
jcr:root.jcr:title: Single Category/Image Navigation
